card.name: Ribrianne (Giant Form)
card.title: Magnificent Love That Saves the Universe
card.leader_skill:
"Special Pose" or 
"Power of Wishes" Category 
Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%
card.passive_skill_itemized_desc:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained
- Changes Ki Spheres: STR to TEQ
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR & TEQ
excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
- High chance of performing a critical hit

specials.name: Fist of Love
specials.special_bonus_1: Super Attack +30% – Super Attack power will be increased even more!

specials.name: Shining Love
specials.description:
Greatly raises ATK temporarily and 
causes destructive damage to enemy
specials.special_bonus_1: Super Attack +30% – Super Attack power will be increased even more!

next_card.name: Ribrianne (Giant Form)
next_card.description:
Can be activated when HP is 66% or less 
with another "Power of Wishes" Category ally 
attacking in the same turn, or starting from 
the 6th turn from the start of battle (once only)
